parameters.name: Visible
parameters.description: True to set the view to visible, false to not

parameters.name: DependentsToo
parameters.description: True to set the dependents of this view to visible, false to not

title: IView.SetVisible
description: Sets the visibility of this drawing view.
signature:
void SetVisible( 
   System.Boolean
Visible
,
   System.Boolean
DependentsToo
)

parameters.name: Visible
parameters.description: True to set the view to visible, false to not

parameters.name: DependentsToo
parameters.description: True to set the dependents of this view to visible, false to not
